font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 放荡的，性欲强的： lacking legal or moral restraints ; having a strong sexual desire
【例】 a moralist who decried what she regarded as the licentious and corrupt culture of the entertainment industry 一个公开谴责在她看来无比堕落和放荡的娱乐圈文化的道德家
【近】 concupiscent, horny, lascivious, lecherous, libidinous, lubricious, salacious, wanton
【反】 frigid, undersex 性冷淡的
【派】 licentiousness n. 放荡

【记】 license有了执照与许可便可以放肆，甚至放荡，没执照啥都不让干
